Axum Integration

PhilJS integrates seamlessly with Axum, the popular Rust web framework, to build full-stack applications with shared types and server-side rendering.

Project Setup

Terminal
$# Create a new full-stack project
$cargo philjs new my-app --template fullstack
$cd my-app

Cargo.toml

Cargo.tomltoml
1[package]
2name = "my-app"
3version = "0.1.0"
4edition = "2021"
5 
6[lib]
7crate-type = ["cdylib", "rlib"]
8 
9[dependencies]
10philjs = { version = "2.0", features = ["csr", "hydrate", "ssr"] }
11philjs-axum = "2.0"
12philjs-router = "2.0"
13philjs-meta = "2.0"
14 
15axum = "0.7"
16tokio = { version = "1", features = ["full"] }
17tower = "0.4"
18tower-http = { version = "0.5", features = ["fs", "compression-gzip"] }
19 
20serde = { version = "1", features = ["derive"] }
21sqlx = { version = "0.7", features = ["postgres", "runtime-tokio"] }
22 
23# WASM dependencies
24wasm-bindgen = "0.2"
25console_error_panic_hook = "0.1"
26 
27[features]
28default = ["ssr"]
29ssr = ["philjs/ssr", "philjs-axum/ssr"]
30hydrate = ["philjs/hydrate"]
31csr = ["philjs/csr"]

Server Setup

src/main.rsrust
1// src/main.rs
2use axum::{
3    routing::{get, post},
4    Router,
5    Extension,
6};
7use philjs::*;
8use philjs_axum::*;
9use sqlx::postgres::PgPoolOptions;
10use std::net::SocketAddr;
11use tower_http::services::ServeDir;
12 
13mod app;
14mod api;
15 
16#[tokio::main]
17async fn main() {
18    // Initialize logging
19    tracing_subscriber::init();
20 
21    // Set up database connection pool
22    let pool = PgPoolOptions::new()
23        .max_connections(5)
24        .connect(&std::env::var("DATABASE_URL").unwrap())
25        .await
26        .expect("Failed to create pool");
27 
28    // Configure PhilJS
29    let conf = get_configuration(None).await.unwrap();
30    let philjs_options = PhiljsOptions::builder()
31        .output_name("bundle")
32        .site_pkg_dir("pkg")
33        .build();
34    let routes = generate_route_list(app::App);
35 
36    // Build the router
37    let app = Router::new()
38        // API routes
39        .route("/api/health", get(api::health))
40        .route("/api/todos", get(api::get_todos).post(api::create_todo))
41        .route("/api/todos/:id", get(api::get_todo).delete(api::delete_todo))
42        // Server functions
43        .philjs_routes(&philjs_options, routes.clone(), app::App)
44        // Static files
45        .nest_service("/pkg", ServeDir::new("pkg"))
46        .nest_service("/assets", ServeDir::new("assets"))
47        // SSR fallback
48        .fallback(philjs_axum::render_app_to_stream(
49            philjs_options.clone(),
50            app::App,
51        ))
52        // Extensions
53        .layer(Extension(pool))
54        .layer(Extension(philjs_options));
55 
56    // Start server
57    let addr = SocketAddr::from(([0, 0, 0, 0], 3000));
58    tracing::info!("Listening on http://{}", addr);
59 
60    let listener = tokio::net::TcpListener::bind(&addr).await.unwrap();
61    axum::serve(listener, app).await.unwrap();
62}

App Component

src/app.rsrust
1// src/app.rs
2use philjs::*;
3use philjs_meta::*;
4use philjs_router::*;
5 
6mod pages;
7use pages::*;
8 
9#[component]
10pub fn App() -> impl IntoView {
11    provide_meta_context();
12 
13    view! {
14        <Html lang="en"/>
15        <Meta charset="utf-8"/>
16        <Meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"/>
17 
18        <Title>"My PhilJS App"</Title>
19        <Stylesheet href="/assets/styles.css"/>
20 
21        <Router>
22            <header>
23                <nav>
24                    <A href="/">"Home"</A>
25                    <A href="/todos">"Todos"</A>
26                    <A href="/about">"About"</A>
27                </nav>
28            </header>
29 
30            <main>
31                <Routes>
32                    <Route path="/" view=HomePage/>
33                    <Route path="/todos" view=TodosPage/>
34                    <Route path="/todos/:id" view=TodoDetailPage/>
35                    <Route path="/about" view=AboutPage/>
36                    <Route path="/*" view=NotFoundPage/>
37                </Routes>
38            </main>
39        </Router>
40 
41        // Hydration scripts
42        <HydrationScripts/>
43    }
44}

API Routes

src/api.rsrust
1// src/api.rs
2use axum::{
3    extract::{Extension, Path, Json},
4    http::StatusCode,
5    response::IntoResponse,
6};
7use serde::{Deserialize, Serialize};
8use sqlx::PgPool;
9 
10#[derive(Debug, Serialize, Deserialize)]
11pub struct Todo {
12    pub id: i32,
13    pub title: String,
14    pub completed: bool,
15}
16 
17#[derive(Debug, Deserialize)]
18pub struct CreateTodo {
19    pub title: String,
20}
21 
22pub async fn health() -> impl IntoResponse {
23    Json(serde_json::json!({ "status": "ok" }))
24}
25 
26pub async fn get_todos(
27    Extension(pool): Extension<PgPool>,
28) -> Result<Json<Vec<Todo>>, StatusCode> {
29    let todos = sqlx::query_as!(Todo, "SELECT * FROM todos ORDER BY id")
30        .fetch_all(&pool)
31        .await
32        .map_err(|_| StatusCode::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)?;
33 
34    Ok(Json(todos))
35}
36 
37pub async fn get_todo(
38    Path(id): Path<i32>,
39    Extension(pool): Extension<PgPool>,
40) -> Result<Json<Todo>, StatusCode> {
41    let todo = sqlx::query_as!(Todo, "SELECT * FROM todos WHERE id = $1", id)
42        .fetch_optional(&pool)
43        .await
44        .map_err(|_| StatusCode::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)?
45        .ok_or(StatusCode::NOT_FOUND)?;
46 
47    Ok(Json(todo))
48}
49 
50pub async fn create_todo(
51    Extension(pool): Extension<PgPool>,
52    Json(payload): Json<CreateTodo>,
53) -> Result<Json<Todo>, StatusCode> {
54    let todo = sqlx::query_as!(
55        Todo,
56        "INSERT INTO todos (title, completed) VALUES ($1, false) RETURNING *",
57        payload.title
58    )
59    .fetch_one(&pool)
60    .await
61    .map_err(|_| StatusCode::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)?;
62 
63    Ok(Json(todo))
64}
65 
66pub async fn delete_todo(
67    Path(id): Path<i32>,
68    Extension(pool): Extension<PgPool>,
69) -> Result<StatusCode, StatusCode> {
70    sqlx::query!("DELETE FROM todos WHERE id = $1", id)
71        .execute(&pool)
72        .await
73        .map_err(|_| StatusCode::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)?;
74 
75    Ok(StatusCode::NO_CONTENT)
76}

Server-Side Rendering

src/pages/todos.rsrust
1// src/pages/todos.rs
2use philjs::*;
3use philjs_router::*;
4 
5#[component]
6pub fn TodosPage() -> impl IntoView {
7    // This resource will be pre-fetched on the server
8    let todos = create_resource(
9        || (),
10        |_| async move {
11            get_todos().await
12        }
13    );
14 
15    view! {
16        <Title>"Todos | My App"</Title>
17 
18        <h1>"My Todos"</h1>
19 
20        <Suspense fallback=move || view! { <p>"Loading..."</p> }>
21            {move || todos.get().map(|result| match result {
22                Ok(todos) => view! {
23                    <ul class="todo-list">
24                        <For
25                            each=move || todos.clone()
26                            key=|todo| todo.id
27                            children=|todo| view! {
28                                <li>
29                                    <A href=format!("/todos/{}", todo.id)>
30                                        {&todo.title}
31                                    </A>
32                                </li>
33                            }
34                        />
35                    </ul>
36                }.into_view(),
37                Err(e) => view! {
38                    <p class="error">{e.to_string()}</p>
39                }.into_view(),
40            })}
41        </Suspense>
42 
43        <TodoForm/>
44    }
45}
46 
47#[component]
48fn TodoForm() -> impl IntoView {
49    let create_todo = create_server_action::<CreateTodo>();
50    let (title, set_title) = create_signal(String::new());
51 
52    view! {
53        <form on:submit=move |ev| {
54            ev.prevent_default();
55            create_todo.dispatch(CreateTodo { title: title() });
56            set_title(String::new());
57        }>
58            <input
59                type="text"
60                prop:value=title
61                on:input=move |ev| set_title(event_target_value(&ev))
62                placeholder="What needs to be done?"
63            />
64            <button type="submit" disabled=move || create_todo.pending()>
65                "Add Todo"
66            </button>
67        </form>
68    }
69}

Authentication

1use axum::{
2    extract::FromRequestParts,
3    http::{request::Parts, StatusCode},
4};
5use axum_extra::extract::CookieJar;
6 
7#[derive(Clone, Debug)]
8pub struct AuthUser {
9    pub id: i32,
10    pub email: String,
11}
12 
13#[async_trait]
14impl<S> FromRequestParts<S> for AuthUser
15where
16    S: Send + Sync,
17{
18    type Rejection = StatusCode;
19 
20    async fn from_request_parts(parts: &mut Parts, state: &S) -> Result<Self, Self::Rejection> {
21        let cookies = CookieJar::from_request_parts(parts, state)
22            .await
23            .map_err(|_| StatusCode::UNAUTHORIZED)?;
24 
25        let session_token = cookies
26            .get("session")
27            .map(|c| c.value().to_string())
28            .ok_or(StatusCode::UNAUTHORIZED)?;
29 
30        // Validate session and get user
31        let user = validate_session(&session_token)
32            .await
33            .map_err(|_| StatusCode::UNAUTHORIZED)?;
34 
35        Ok(user)
36    }
37}
38 
39// Protected API route
40pub async fn get_profile(
41    user: AuthUser,
42) -> Json<AuthUser> {
43    Json(user)
44}
45 
46// Protected server function
47#[server(GetUserData)]
48pub async fn get_user_data() -> Result<UserData, ServerFnError> {
49    let user = expect_context::<AuthUser>()
50        .map_err(|_| ServerFnError::ServerError("Unauthorized".into()))?;
51 
52    // Fetch user-specific data
53    Ok(fetch_user_data(user.id).await?)
54}

Middleware

1use axum::middleware::{self, Next};
2use axum::response::Response;
3use axum::http::Request;
4use std::time::Instant;
5 
6// Logging middleware
7pub async fn logging<B>(
8    request: Request<B>,
9    next: Next<B>,
10) -> Response {
11    let start = Instant::now();
12    let method = request.method().clone();
13    let uri = request.uri().clone();
14 
15    let response = next.run(request).await;
16 
17    let duration = start.elapsed();
18    tracing::info!(
19        method = %method,
20        uri = %uri,
21        status = %response.status(),
22        duration = ?duration,
23    );
24 
25    response
26}
27 
28// Apply middleware
29let app = Router::new()
30    .route("/api/*", api_routes)
31    .layer(middleware::from_fn(logging))
32    .layer(tower_http::compression::CompressionLayer::new())
33    .layer(tower_http::cors::CorsLayer::permissive());

Deployment

Terminal
$# Build for production
$cargo philjs build --release
$
$# The build output includes:
$# - target/release/my-app (server binary)
$# - pkg/ (WASM and JS bundles)
$# - assets/ (static files)

Docker Deployment

Dockerfiledockerfile
1FROM rust:1.75 as builder
2 
3WORKDIR /app
4COPY . .
5 
6# Install wasm-pack
7RUN cargo install wasm-pack cargo-philjs
8 
9# Build the application
10RUN cargo philjs build --release
11 
12FROM debian:bookworm-slim
13 
14WORKDIR /app
15 
16# Copy built artifacts
17COPY --from=builder /app/target/release/my-app ./
18COPY --from=builder /app/pkg ./pkg
19COPY --from=builder /app/assets ./assets
20 
21ENV PORT=3000
22EXPOSE 3000
23 
24CMD ["./my-app"]
